meanings.definition: A person who views or examines something in advance.
meanings.sent1: The previewer carefully looked at the movie trailer before deciding to watch the film.
meanings.sent2: The previewer at the art gallery checked out the paintings before the exhibit opened.
meanings.sent3: The previewer peeked at the last page of the book to see how it ended.
meanings.sent4: She was like a previewer of the future, always trying to anticipate what would happen next.
meanings.sent5: The previewer's job was to give a sneak peek of the upcoming products to the team.

meanings.definition: A software tool that allows users to see a sample or preview of a document or file before opening it.
meanings.sent1: The previewer on the website showed a small image of the document before downloading.
meanings.sent2: I used the previewer feature to check the layout of my presentation slides.
meanings.sent3: The previewer glitched and displayed the wrong file, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: The previewer acted like a crystal ball, giving a glimpse of what was inside the document.
meanings.sent5: With the previewer, I could see a snapshot of the report without opening it fully.
